meanings.definition: The act of putting items into a container or wrapping them up for transportation or storage.
meanings.sent1: I helped with the packings of our belongings before moving to a new house.
meanings.sent2: The packings of fragile items in bubble wrap ensured they arrived safely.
meanings.sent3: The packings of the gifts were so neat, it looked like a work of art!
meanings.sent4: Her packings of emotions were hidden behind a smile, but I could sense her sadness.
meanings.sent5: The meticulous packings of the suitcase made it easy to find everything.

meanings.definition: The material used to fill a space or protect items during transportation.
meanings.sent1: The delicate glassware was wrapped in soft packings to prevent breakage.
meanings.sent2: The packings of foam provided cushioning for the fragile electronics.
meanings.sent3: He joked that the packings of pillows made the moving boxes look like fluffy clouds.
meanings.sent4: The packings of memories in her heart kept her warm during lonely nights.
meanings.sent5: The packings of bubble wrap kept the package safe during its journey.

meanings.definition: A group of items that have been wrapped or arranged together for convenience or efficiency.
meanings.sent1: The packings of snacks for the picnic included sandwiches, fruits, and drinks.
meanings.sent2: The packings of tools in the toolbox made it easy to find the right one quickly.
meanings.sent3: The packings of books in the library were organized by genre for easy browsing.
meanings.sent4: The packings of stars in the night sky created a mesmerizing view.
meanings.sent5: The packings of clothes in the suitcase were neatly folded and stacked.
